Text: Uh Oh... It seems that I left auto crop on in HandBrake and it cropped some episodes that didn't need it (episodes 5, 10, and 16.) I will stop seeding this torrent and create another one and then delete this once I fix the episodes. All you have to do do then is just point the new torrent at the same directory and continue your download. Sorry about this.
Update: Never mind... I double checked and there's nothing wrong with the cropping for this season anyway.
TY CANT SEEM TO GET WHOLE SET AT ALL :)
